document.title: A R K A N S A S F I N E A R T S ACADEMIC STANDARDS 2020 MUSIC

FF0EEA8705C74A89803BBC5B003D84E9.description:
I can research and
analyze a specific piece
of music in terms of its
time period, region,
and culture.

B464C9487D5B4060ADDB5CED9EA3BD23.description:
I can research and
analyze the historical
and cultural relationships
between musical works,
other art forms, and
other contexts.

2382D02BB4BD4DC2BC1ACBF2FC7B757A.description:
I can evaluate the
connections between
musical works, other
art forms, and
other contexts.

C48BE389DA684FA5822A1045E893D6B7.description:
I can explain
connections between
musical works, other
art forms, and
other contexts.

FB80E4A7D72042E3BAF3AB2310CA24B0.description:
I can independently
identify connections
between musical works,
other art forms, and
other contexts.

B2073DF97A194C70A2F615B2194CD4E4.description:
I can explore with
guidance connections
between musical works,
other art forms, and
other contexts.

EAF943583A35445DAA769B8C7B1876EF.description:
Relate: Students will relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural, and historical
context to deepen understanding.

CCF1AD8E92A640B0B2B099AE93F03811.description:
I can defend my
interpretation of a
musical work that
conveys the
composer’s intent.

A878139D88A14865AFDAD8D14579F3E3.description:
I can evaluate the
quality of a musical
performance using
personal knowledge,
skills, and experiences
that convey the
composer’s intent.

0B07A49CCEE545F38E53A37EA60043F1.description:
I can apply personal
knowledge, skills, and
experiences to interpret
the composer’s intent.

7DEC7E0909134EAFBF295F85A4CA2965.description:
I can connect
personal knowledge,
skills, and experiences to
musical performances.

2ACAD4413D564190BD69E02D83F99D8D.description:
I can explain
how personal
knowledge, skills, and
experiences influence
musical performances.

4A73543A339B4E84AF02CF03021022AA.description:
I can identify
how personal
experiences influence
musical performances.

2637C96A7911405DBAD760C846312B5D.description: Connect: Students will synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

A9C4203FA15D44A1992C3091330ACEDF.description:
I can evaluate works
and performances
based on research,
as well as personally
and collaboratively
developed criteria,
including analysis and
interpretation of the
structure and context.

E76CD2ED8F594C778494691545C760F8.description:
I can evaluate works
and performances
based on personally
or collaboratively
developed criteria,
including analysis of the
structure and context.

54BEEC30F3394D5580096FFC2CA5C12A.description:
I can explain how
experiences, analysis,
and the context of a
musical work influence
the interest in and
evaluation of the piece.

C95E8ADEE7AF478C85E59968CD2406AD.description:
I can apply
independently
generated criteria
to evaluate
musical selections.

C860C7E212F249068929E19085549B8F.description:
I can establish
independently
generated criteria
to evaluate
musical selections.

A5DCCA031BDC4A1E856127FC9875F3E4.description:
I can evaluate musical
selections using teacher-generated criteria.

05DFB99A1F484309BC4E538B9D61D6F2.description: Critique: Students will apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

E276EFADDB74455A9A0AAEBC3A3CA560.description:
I can support
interpretations of the
expressive intent and
meaning of musical
works, citing as evidence
the treatment of the
elements of music,
contexts, setting of
the text, and varied
researched sources.

E400AB7CB8BD4E708A02243C8D9A0AC9.description:
I can develop criteria
to use when analyzing
music, based on
elements of music,
interests, purpose,
and context.

F866422510F848A58456C5EB379D78A0.description:
I can analyze elements
of music, interests,
purpose, and context
in a selected work.

EF77A31F5AEB4FBA8693B40F47C0B4D7.description:
I can interpret the
expressive intent
of musical works,
referencing the
musical elements.

4AEA871CC5144B2898D01295C0C9961A.description:
I can identify elements
of music, interests,
purpose, and context
in a selected work.

4358D7FF05434CDB9CA47C19F1F7F6AD.description:
I can identify, with
guidance, elements
of music, interests,
purpose, and context in
a selected work.

5618744BC2174074952B9C81BB1F6E1A.description: Interpret: Students will interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

8D073C390A4C4676A7658A8D283B9EC2.description:
I can use research and
provided criteria to
justify choices made
when selecting music by
citing knowledge of the
music and the specified
purpose and context.

E4A08DC121514C9EA558CAD7C20DB6BA.description:
I can use provided
criteria to justify
choices made when
selecting music.

97AD3BD6E8ED4A7B9FAAB44B2594EA32.description:
I can explain reasons for
selecting music, citing
characteristics of the
music and connections
to interest, purpose,
and context.

28046B320F1645E89F0D1A0C89D7D653.description:
I can discuss reasons for
selecting music based
on characteristics
of the music and
personal interest.

A8DAB27151CE4159B82738BE4EC08403.description:
I can identify, with
limited guidance,
reasons for selecting
music based on
characteristics of
the music and
personal interest.

E15A258E2A96479297B88AF50EF4DDA8.description:
I can identify, with
guidance, reasons for
selecting music based
on characteristics of
the music and
personal interest.

A75BBC3920B54480A0C2F117F230C182.description: Select: Students will perceive and analyze artistic work.

A23E1BEA9BDE432CA8D0CD34A6C6B4F3.description:
I can model proper
stage and listening
etiquette and
performance standards
for individuals
and ensembles.

FC9A7ECA8C2A4732BF3A947A1E23224C.description:
I can demonstrate
mastery of the technical
demands and expressive
elements across a varied
repertoire of increasingly
complex music in
multiple types of
performing ensembles,
representing diverse
cultures and styles, and
utilizing correct vocal
technique, while relating
to particular audiences.

1FFFA1F57CAA406DAAEFA8D1C0970D0F.description:
I can explain the impact
on the performance of
practicing appropriate
listening etiquette and
performance standards.

C5830058091C452F851121DB37D8652E.description:
I can demonstrate
consistent attention to
technical accuracy and
expressive elements
in performance across
a varied repertoire of
increasingly complex
music, representing
diverse cultures and
styles, and utilizing
correct vocal technique,
while relating to
particular audiences.

A28FE9D3F6604146B73BC12C5FF0AF6B.description:
I can discuss the
reasons for practicing
appropriate stage and
listening etiquette and
performance standards.

AD7A23F2248B4596AEE9E096827B32A5.description:
I can demonstrate
attention to technical
accuracy and expressive
elements in performance
across a varied
repertoire of music,
utilizing correct
vocal technique.

3A124458E1C54B63A49E2D84F0980028.description:
I can practice stage and
listening etiquette and
performance standards
for individuals
and ensembles.

E711E75E8BE04A2A819D3E7BBE1AD180.description:
I can sing
expressively with
attention to dynamics,
phrasing, articulation,
blend, and balance,
utilizing correct vocal
technique in a formal or
informal performance.

9D60C0426D794212A881F79E2CFED9CC.description:
I can practice, with
limited guidance,
proper stage and
listening etiquette
and performance
standards for individuals
and ensembles.

4FFE8D632DFD4451AF4117658D11620B.description:
I can sing expressively
with attention to
dynamics, phrasing, and
articulation, utilizing
correct vocal technique
in a formal or
informal performance.

FD56D54D98F0484A93C7AE019B09430B.description:
I can develop, with
guidance, proper stage
and listening etiquette
and performance
standards for individuals
and ensembles.

5B25D1D96F5D4A4E90EC246D8C881D79.description:
I can demonstrate
beginning understanding
of correct vocal
technique in a formal or
informal performance.

33196F3AF2814727A035214F97E62A43.description: Rehearse: Students will convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

DDAF698D8E244F1880361444FE0C5936.description:
I can develop and apply
appropriate rehearsal
strategies to address
individual and ensemble
challenges in a varied
repertoire of music and
evaluate their success.

FF83EC1C8DE84A8780D993A7DAA74CF4.description:
I can use teacher
and peer feedback
and self-reflection
to refine elements
of vocal technique,
musical expression, and
ensemble technique in
varied repertoire.

C722228D82C548E08C00085D34FF6E5B.description:
I can use teacher
and peer feedback
to refine elements
of vocal technique,
musical expression, and
ensemble technique
in varied repertoire.

0439797BEEAA419C866AEEE570960613.description:
I can demonstrate
increasingly complex
concepts of vocal
technique in a
choral setting.

3ECD45E4981E447FAA0AFC711AA6EF73.description:
I can demonstrate
beginning concepts of
vocal technique in a
choral setting.

9DD886C808D943C79D6E88EEB41983F7.description:
I can explore
beginning concepts
of vocal technique in
a choral setting with
teacher guidance.

9AC5E6034A1941A6ABC68AD0A3DECA6E.description: Rehearse: Students will refine vocal technique.

335E5EB27B03430ABAF2BB2E00592C79.description:
I can sing and/
or sight-sing, alone
and with others,
increasingly advanced
musical notation
based on appropriate
time signatures, key
signatures, symbols,
terminology in various
languages, and using
non-traditional notation.

B0AC00981B224FFF89C4B66D62B3A0F1.description:
I can sing and/or
sight-sing, alone and
with others, advanced
musical notation
based on appropriate
time signatures, key
signatures, symbols, and
terminology in
various languages.

F01C15E7C7E943BA9C1DAE7A64A4A610.description:
I can sing and/
or sight-sing, alone
and with others,
increasingly complex
musical notation
based on appropriate
time signatures, key
signatures, symbols,
and terminology

7F9248288F1E4629A7BAC5C7C91530BB.description:
I can sing and/
or sight-sing, alone
and with others,
increasingly complex
musical notation
based on appropriate
time signatures, key
signatures, and symbols.

BCA2D234D26C41C4A3C818EE89999E95.description:
I can read and sing,
alone and with others,
basic musical notation
based on appropriate
time signatures.

B2F4FD8DA0274A579C8017C73B5AD4C5.description:
I can identify basic
musical notation with
teacher guidance.

09B32341D9B64F20847B1B9593F8CAF1.description: Sight-read: Students will read music notation.

E2770457B50D4DDEB4698C123C13E6D5.description: Students will develop and refine artistic work.

39D705BC86DC491F95AEB31F1177D958.description:
I can analyze, document,
and demonstrate the
manner in which the
elements of music and
context contribute to the
composer’s intent f
or performance.

2296AEC984C2489794AC8CD5F121C298.description:
I can demonstrate
understanding and
application of expressive
qualities in a varied
repertoire of music
through performance.

E516A49CA8A44A62BFD13A89F247A17B.description:
I can explain the
manner in which the
elements of music
contribute to the
composer’s intent
for performance.

8B7DAD44DC374C23851B11CD05E62B99.description:
I can identify and
interpret, with guidance,
expressive elements in
a varied repertoire of
music in preparation
for performance.

87A367AB4E5A4011A764D1F416B59E6D.description:
I can identify, with
limited guidance, the
elements of music and
their purpose within a
vocal work.

53D7EC04CF444683802926FE40371E0F.description:
I can identify, with
guidance, the elements
of music and their
purpose within a
vocal work.

C32492AF8FBA4BDFB3DC10AAA200A6E1.description: Analyze: Students will analyze and interpret artistic work for performance.

4C12F369ED3D4675A34509A507DAD0F7.description:
I can develop and apply
criteria to select a varied
repertoire to study
and perform based
on an understanding
of theoretical and
structural characteristics
and expressive
challenges in the music,
the technical skill of the
individual or ensemble,
and the purpose
and context of
the performance.

D0014CA65710409DBD01B9BB31D2C649.description:
I can explain the
manner in which
self-selected music
addresses the music reading skill and vocal
skill of the individual
or ensemble for a
potential performance.

28AD196671B44A74A31472580CD3D5CF.description:
I can select varied
repertoire based on
music-reading skills
and vocal skill of
the individual or
ensemble for a
potential performance

5F987BFBB0DE49D6B46C777D6BB249F7.description:
I can select, with
guidance, varied
repertoire to study,
based on interest,
music-reading
skill, and vocal skill
of the individual
or ensemble for a
potential performance.

9F71629F883B4610A224AEF63CBA7880.description:
I can select, with
guidance, passages,
excerpts, or sections of
a vocal work, based on
interest, music-reading
skill, and vocal skill
of the individual
or ensemble for a
potential performance.

2A6D8A9DF6DA4E6C8AC2796F38CA548D.description:
I can explore a variety of
vocal repertoire, based
on interest, music reading skill, and vocal
skill of the individual
or ensemble for a
potential performance.

D1737B754B7140B89D364E445BE0C6A8.description: Select: Students will develop and refine artistic techniques and work for presentation.

97C226614B814D8E9E7EE26C52E51186.description: Students will select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

76A469C7C10D48E998A2CA093A5A6C02.description:
I can share, reflect on,
and refine ideas for
arrangements, sections,
and short compositions,
using personally
developed criteria,
using technology
when available.

20FB8ACBA093429992E65F502FB87690.description:
I can share, reflect on,
and refine ideas
for melodies,
rhythmic passages,
and arrangements,
using personally
developed criteria,
using technology
when available.

4F6F27425B9C480CA35B2DE10207428C.description:
I can share, reflect
on, and refine short
rhythmic and/or
melodic phrases
built on a motive,
using collaboratively
developed criteria,
using technology
when available.

5E9F10F680A040B5A7C92CE6BD3ADCD1.description:
I can share, reflect on,
and refine extended
rhythmic and/or
melodic patterns,
using collaboratively
developed criteria,
using technology
when available.

536C2A542526458D816803BEB0D27EBA.description:
I can share,
reflect on, and
refine motives
using teacher-provided criteria.

E8C3B2A856B545348043B6206F254C17.description:
I can share and reflect
on a short rhythmic and/
or melodic pattern.

44864C0FA3B74E0DAEC88D89FBB18838.description: Revise: Students will refine and complete artistic work.

D307DC58324140378C49064B7F9343C5.description:
I can select,
develop, and preserve
arrangements, sections,
and short compositions
for specific purposes
that demonstrate
understanding of
characteristics of
music from a variety
of cultures.

F5A4D014102F4D4C94A9A53F28CF9EB2.description:
I can select, develop,
and preserve draft
melodies, rhythmic
passages, and
arrangements for
specific purposes
that demonstrate
understanding of
characteristics of
music from a variety of
historical periods.

8F11C74EB2CD474FA08FE97E47CBBF83.description:
I can select, develop,
and preserve draft
melodies and
rhythmic passages
for specific purposes
that demonstrate
understanding of
characteristics of
music from a variety of
historical periods.

342BEC9BF7EB45FA8D5DCA909380A55E.description:
I can select, develop,
and preserve
draft melodies or
rhythmic passages
for specific purposes
that demonstrate
understanding of
characteristics of
music or text(s).

CF795804DA8E49BF9DE8CC10A54B8F38.description:
I can select, develop,
and preserve draft
melodic and rhythmic
ideas or motives
that demonstrate
understanding of
characteristics of music
or text(s).

05A26E07AC174B098F30323E38B4016C.description:
I can develop and
preserve a rhythmic or
melodic idea or motive.

A001118C48B649E2986D6FCB325ECB20.description: Plan and Make: Students will organize and develop artistic ideas and work.

3F7E19BE7C9A48B7AB668163421E07D7.description:
I can compose and
improvise ideas for
arrangements, sections,
and short compositions,
using technology
when available.

7D4166AD0A2246B8A4E06E583CAF22B5.description:
I can compose and
improvise ideas for
melodies and
rhythmic passages,
using technology
when available.

4CB589A6B12A4C6895818F1B99694855.description:
I can create and
notate a short rhythmic
and/or melodic phrase
based on a motive,
using technology
when available.

41C7FA7E8E0C4C27865598D0023EABBB.description:
I can create and
notate a rhythmic
and/or melodic pattern,
using technology
when available.

6E844E5143454BF0AB6049F5AD5B4760.description:
I can improvise a
short rhythmic and/or
melodic pattern.

5FBB2A0C77F14F7E89B5416B41F0570A.description: Imagine: Students will organize and develop artistic ideas and work.
